description:
http://anidb.net/ch18102 [Shibuya Yuuri] was living a pretty normal life. That changed the day he was dunked into a toilet after an attempt to save a classmate from a gang of bullies. Instead of just getting a good soaking, he`s pulled in. The next thing he knows, he`s in a world that vaguely resembles medieval Europe. If that`s not odd enough, he`s told that he is to be the next Maoh, just because he has black hair and black eyes. The Maoh is the King of the Mazoku, who are coexisting not-so-peacefully with the humans in this world. Much to his subjects` dismay, he`s totally different from the rulers they`re accustomed to. He`s kind, considerate, a believer in justice, and not willing to use violence to solve conflicts - not exactly someone they want running a country on the very brink of war. Now, Yuuri has to deal with trying to become a good Maoh, while at the same time attempting to adapt to this land`s customs and culture, all in a world where the tension between the humans and Mazoku is reaching its peak.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
When ordinary high school student Yuri Shibuya defends a classmate from some bullies, he winds up dunked in a toilet that somehow transports him to a strange land, where he is told that he`s the new Demon King!
Source: crunchyroll

After a heated exchange over an insult to his mother, Yuri discovers he`s mistakenly proposed marriage... to Lord Wolfram!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel! Hot Boy vs. Baseball Boy
決闘! 美少年VS野球少年

REGULAR.description:
When Gwendal and Conrad go off to protect a village under attack, Yuri learns the truth of the battle and resolves to become the Demon King to put an end to the fighting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shibuya Yuri! Ore ga Maou da
Yuri Shibuya! I AM the Demon King!
渋谷有利! 俺がマ王だ

REGULAR.description:
Having returned to Earth, Yuri resumes his normal life and returns to baseball practice, while his mother reminisces about the past.
Source: crunchyroll

While enjoying a party at sea during a trip to Van Da Via Island, the ship is attacked by pirates, forcing Yuri to unleash his magic once again...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: セーラー服ときかん坊

REGULAR.description:
Arriving on Van Da Via Island, Yuri and the others hear of a tale of a cursed hot spring and believe it could be where they`ll find Morgif, the Demon Sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Terror Of Morgif, A Man-Eating Demon Sword?
人喰いマ剣・モルギフの恐怖?

REGULAR.description:
Josak fools Yuri into a fight to the death to power up Morgif by absorbing souls, but his opponent is Rick, the young apprentice from the ship!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Runaway? Stray? Demon Sword in Motion!
暴走? 迷走? マ剣発動!

REGULAR.description:
With Yuri back on Earth once more, Stoffel, former regent to the previous Demon Queen, begins to hatch a plan to demonstrate how much Yuri will need him.
Source: crunchyroll

As morning comes, everything appears quiet despite the commotion the night before, but it is soon discovered that the gem of the Dragon King was stolen from the crown in the treasure room!
Source: crunchyroll

Stoffel and Raven begin the next phase of their plan when Yuri investigates the theft of the gem, forcing Conrad and Wolfram to come to his rescue!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hand of Evil Looms Closer!

REGULAR.description:
Having captured Yuri, Stoffel tries to convince him to join his side, but Josak sneaks him out as two armies prepare for battle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigen no Mokou de Sensou ga Hajimaru
The War Begins in the Alternate World
次元のむこうで戦争がはじまる

REGULAR.description:
While on a trip to find an imposter Demon King, Yuri, Conrad, and Wolfram come across Gwendal, and an encounter with a Sand Bear separates the group into two pairs.
Source: crunchyroll

Arriving in Svelera, Yuri and Gwendal meet a runaway bride who reveals she has the Demon Flute, but when Yuri tries to use it, it doesn`t work!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 花嫁と有利とグウェンダル

REGULAR.description:
Gwendal and Yuri are put on trial over their "relationship" and when Yuri is unable to harm Gwendal to save himself, he is sentenced to hard labor in a mine filled with esoteric stones that suppress demon magic.
Source: crunchyroll

With Norika reunited with her son, Yuri discovered the other piece of the Demon Flute and decides to see what it can do.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuri heads into a city after hearing of a stolen demon stone, finding in in the hands of a poor family that have been using it to earn money for food, leading Yuri to decide to help them out.
Source: crunchyroll

After announcing her intention to marry Raven, Celi`s past and her connection to Raven and Stoffel is revealed, while Yuri and the others are invited to a celebration.
Source: crunchyroll

The castle`s guest house has been taken over by monsters, so Yuri, who wants to get a night of peace away from Wolfram, resolves to clear it of the unwanted guests.
Source: crunchyroll

Deciding he wants to see a dragon, Yuri sets out with Wolfram, Conrad, and Günter travel to a preserve where they discover dragon poachers, and one of them challenges Yuri to a fight!
Source: crunchyroll

After his defeat in battle, the poacher reveals his name to be Alford, who explains his motivation to fight Yuri while the group makes plans to protect the dragons.
Source: crunchyroll

During a visit from Nicola, someone arrives at the castle claiming to be Yuri`s illegitimate child!
Source: crunchyroll

Despite his twisted ankle, Yuri takes Greta into town and gets captured by some thugs, but after being saved by Wolfram and Conrad, they are attacked by a masked man!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuri and the others attend a race between rare animals, where Yuri puts himself on the line against Vullion to restore the freedom of the western area!
Source: crunchyroll

Having returned to the Demon Kingdom, Yuri learns from Gisela what happened twenty years ago with Hube and a woman named Julia...
Source: crunchyroll

Hube attacks Yuri once again, and this time, Gwendal will see to it that Hube dies for his crimes! Will Hube survive to see the birth of his child?!
Source: crunchyroll

With Yuri back in the human world once more, Conrad reminisces about his mission to deliver the soul of the next Demon King to Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

Human unrest in the Demon World is leading to a potential war, pulling Yuri back from Earth. But this time, he wasn`t summoned by Conrad and the others! Who is behind this?
Source: crunchyroll

Now that Murata is in the Demon World has well, Yuri brings him along as they meet the owner of a castle in the hopes of returning to the Demon Kingdom.
Source: crunchyroll

Traveling from Caloria to Big Cimaron, Yuri, Murata, and Lady Julia are attacked by Small Cimaron as Josak reveals his presence!
Source: crunchyroll

Captured by Big Cimaron, Yuri learns of the four Forbidden Boxes and the tremendous destructive power that they hold...
Source: crunchyroll

Maxine intends to open the box using Conrad`s arm as the key, but Murata warns of the consequences of using the wrong key!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuri confronts Murata about who he really is while the people of Caloria agree to receive help from the Demon Tribe.
Source: crunchyroll

The quadrennial Ultimate Tournament is approaching and Yuri proposes forming a team to win back The End of the Wind despite Big Cimaron`s rigging of the games.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Run For It! The Snow Sled Race
激走! 雪ゾリレース

REGULAR.description:
The tournament begins and Lady Flynn is captured for ransom to force Yuri`s team to forfeit the battle!
Source: crunchyroll

With Lady Flynn`s rescue, Yuri prepares for his fight, but his resolve is shaken when he discovers who he`s facing...
Source: crunchyroll

Big Cimaron`s King Belar declares Yuri`s team disqualified and awards the win to his own country, but Yuri refuses to abide such disrespect to sporting competition and unleashes his power!
Source: crunchyroll

While Yuri tries to convince Murata to return him to the Demon World, Big Cimaron has located another Forbidden Box!
Source: crunchyroll

Heathcrife helps Yuri and the others travel to a land called Fransia, where the next box is located, but Fransia`s king refuses to pick a side...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ギュンターVSコンラッド

REGULAR.description:
After hours of chasing down the box, Yuri and the others track it to an old training ground, but are they walking into a trap?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 血盟城ベビーパニック!
復讐鬼? マキシーン
The Holy Sword and the Demon Sword (Part 1)
The Holy Sword and the Demon Sword (Part 2)
Showdown! Demon King vs. Koch Army
対決! マ王VSコッヒー軍団
The Bridge We Hang Upon Tomorrow
Until the Day We Meet Again
Complete Works I - Birth of a Demon King Arc
大全集II ~魔剣モルギフ編~
Taizenshuu III: Shinmakoku no Inbou Hen
大全集III ~眞魔国の陰謀編~
Taizenshuu V: Yurusa Rezaru Kako Hen
大全集V ~許されざる過去編~
Taizenshuu VI: Kinki no Hako Hen
Taizenshuu VIII: Fuu no Owari Hen
Taizenshuu IX: Toudo no Gouka Hen
"Kyou kara Maou! Blu-Ray Box Season 1" 2013-nen 9-gatsu 27-nichi (Kin) Hatsubai!!
『今日からマ王! Blu-ray BOX シーズン1』2013年9月27日(金)発売!!
Kyo Kara Maoh! - God (?) Save Our King!
From today on, a demon king
